shows.showDescription: Vijay Kumar aka VK is a crime journalist who works in Delhi. He exposes a couple of politicians – Deshbandhu Sharma (Raza Murad) and his partner – with dire consequences. VK is beaten up so badly that he becomes partially paralysed. He is arrested and sent to jail under a false pretext. VK serves his sentence and gets released. With the help of his girlfriend Maria (Sumalatha), he starts his own publication. Information for the paper is provided by the mysterious Vis...Read Morehwanath whom no one has met. Soon, when VK’s enemies start dying, his sister Uma (Urvashi) begins to wonder whether things are as they should be....Hide

shows.actor: Mohanlal, Laya, Jagathi Sreekumar, Manoj K. Jayan, Innocent, Siddique, Sukanya
shows.showDescription:
Udayon movie revolves around 75 year old Suranadu Kunju and his son Papoyi ( Both are Mohanlal). Kunju thinks that the heartbeat of earth is in soil and not in maths. His beliefs on the land and agrarianism is good but his value system that farmers and farming is more important and better is not. He does not let his sons pursue there interest and wants them to do farming also. Which leads in they becoming negative towards father.
Also when he tries to marry off his daug...Read Morehter to an ugly but farming loving another narrow minded character instead of an educated handsome doctor makes them feel that the father is destroying and spoiling their lives with his stubbornness and high handedness. The presence of a villainous brother in law to his sister’s son JCB (he drives a JCB played by Kalabhavan Mani) adds a twist as he interferes in the family property dispute.All said and done the sister doesnot want eveil to her brother (Mohanlal) and her younger son the mute also doesnot want.
Papoyi tries to save things but never has luck ultimately he tries and prevents many a bad scene but cannot prevent his youngest brother being killed and Kunju kills the villainous brother in law Perumal (Salim Ghouse) who does the evil deed and gives the family property keys to sister and the patriarch stick to Papoyi after the death of his youngest kid Ponnan....Hide

shows.actor: Dilip, Preetha Vijaykumar, Ambika, Captain Raju, Narendra Prasad, Sudheesh, Innocent
shows.showDescription:
Udayapuram Sulthan movie tells Avittam Thirunal Narayana Varma( Narendra Prasad) who is the former Ruler and a loving grandfather. His daughter Malavika Thampuratti (Ambika) had at one time walked out of the palace after falling in love with Abdul Rahman (Captain Raju) who is crippled in the ensuing clash with her brothers. Sulaiman (Dileep) who has been nurtured in Carnatic classical music by his mother. His main rival in college is Unnikrishnan (Sudheesh) who is the so...Read Moren of a famous Brahmin priest. Unnikrishnan wins the musical contest at college which entitles him to sing at the famous Chembai Sangeethotsavam, but it is Sulaiman, in a twist of identities, that finally makes it to the musical fete. There he is a big hit with the audience.
Sulaiman is persuaded to go to his grandfather’s palace to attend an important religious ceremony to remove the impediments to the marriage of the ruler’s grand daughter Gopika (Preetha Vijayakumar). Gopika falls for the charm of Sulaiman, alias Unnikrishnan. The ruler also likes the young man. The entry of the real Unnikrishnan (Sudheesh) who would also like to marry Gopika. Finally, history repeats itself, but without real harm being done, when Malavika Thampuratti and Abdul Rahman come to claim their son. The ball is now in the court of the grandfather, whether Udyapuram Palace needs a Sultan or not....Hide

shows.showDescription: The story revolves around Raju (Chiru), a guide and caretaker of 4 young orphans. One day he comes upon a magical ring in the Himmalayas, where he had gone to search for a cure for one of the children, who was accidentally injured. The ring belongs to a celestial being, Indraja (Sridevi), the daughter of Lord Indra. She comes back to Earth to retrieve it. During her earthly voyage, she becomes close with the orphans, is kidnapped by a sorceror who wants to sacrifice her ...Read Moreto become immortal, is rescued, and eventually finds true love, Raju. She, at the end, throws away her ring and goes to her love instead of returning to her heavenly abode....Hide

shows.showDescription: Sanjay Ramasamy (Surya Sivakumar) is a millionaire businessman who has turned into a recluse living at an apartment building. He used to be in love with the mischievous Kalpana (Asin) who has been brutally murdered by Ghajini (Pradeep Rawat). When Kalpana rescues twenty-five children from the clutches of Ghajini, he retaliates by killing her. Sanjay, who had tried to help her, had been hit on the head so hard that he suffers from short-term memory lasting for only a few ...Read Moreminutes at a time. Watch the film to see how Sanjay manages to trap the criminal who had killed the love of his life....Hide

shows.showDescription: In 1987, Sherrie Christian arrives in Los Angeles from Oklahoma with dreams of becoming a famous singer, while barback Drew Boley prepares for another night of work at The Bourbon Room. As Sherrie approaches The Bourbon, her suitcase is stolen, including her records. Seeing the incident, Drew tries to catch the robber, but fails. He comforts Sherrie and, upon learning of her situation, he gets her a job at the Bourbon Room as a waitress.
shows.trivia: When Drew is clocking in at the "Bourbon" the first few notes of Steve Perry’s hit 1984 single, "Oh, Sherrie" can be heard, an obvious connection the character of Sherrie whom Drew is thinking about.

shows.showDescription: Tony Stark (Robert Downey Jr) is a playboy cum engineering genius. He goes to Afghanistan to demonstrate a new missile and is captured and wounded there. His captors insist that he assemble a new missile for them. But Tony creates an armoured suit and uses it to make his escape. On returning home to the USA, he makes an announcement that his company will stop manufacturing weapons. He begins work on an updated armoured suit when he finds out that his second-in-command, O...Read Morebadiah Stane (Jeff Bridges), has been selling the company weapons to the insurgents. Watch Tony use his new suit to destroy the arms sold and stop Stane from misusing his research....Hide

shows.showDescription: Cole (Tom Cruise) loves to race cars and is very good at it. But he is not focussed enough to win at races. Tim Daland (Randy Quaid) hires veteran car racer Harry Hogge (Robert Duvall) to build a car. He takes on Cole to drive it. Harry teaches Cole how to focus on winning, making use of his talent. Cole gets into a fight with the circuit’s star driver Rowdy Burns (Michael Rooker). They smash their cars and land in hospital. Cole recovers to get into racing again, ...Read Morewith Harry giving him a warning for careless behaviour. At the finals, Cole is set against Russ Wheeler (Cary Elwes) who is keen to break Cole. Will Cole get hurt again or go on to win the race?...Hide
shows.trivia: Most of the cars used in this film were actually Chevrolets outfitted with special fiberglass bodies made to resemble stock cars. The vehicles routinely broke down from the strain of the racing or had their bodies greatly damaged. At one point, half the fleet was in the repair shop.

shows.actor: Mark Wahlberg, Charlize Theron, Edward Norton, Seth Green, Jason Statham, Mos Def
shows.showDescription: Charlie (Mark Wahlberg) is a mastermind thief and the gold bullion heist at a palace in Venice is a job executed to perfection. Along with him are Steve (Edward Norton), the man inside, Lyle (Seth Green), the computer expert, Rob (Jason Statham), the wheelman, Left-Ear (Mos Def), the bomb expert and John (Donald Sutherland). Charlie is shocked to the core when one of them turns out to be a double-crosser. Watch the film to see how the gang deals with the situation.
shows.trivia: Two electric-powered Mini Coopers, and one Mini Cooper S had to be specially built for the film, since gasoline-powered vehicles are not allowed to operate in L.A.’s subway system.

shows.trivia: Julia Roberts was offered the role of Leigh Anne Tuohy before Sandra Bullock, who turned it down three times because of her concerns about playing the part of a devout Christian. During the first couple of weeks of shooting, she thought her acting was so bad she considered dropping out. John Lee Hancock had worked so hard on the project she didn’t want to ruin it. However, she didn’t quit and ended up winning the Best Leading Actress Oscar for her performance as Leigh Anne Tuohy.

shows.actor: Charlie Chaplin, Mack Swain, Tom Murray, Malcolm Waite, Georgia Hale, Henry Bergman
shows.musicDirector: Charlie Chaplin, Carli Elinor, Max Terr, James L. Fields
shows.showDescription:
The Tramp (Charlie Chaplin) travels to the Yukon to take part in the Klondike Gold Rush. Bad weather strands him in a remote cabin with a prospector who has found a large gold deposit (Mack Swain) and an escaped fugitive (Tom Murray), after which they part ways, with the prospector and the fugitive fighting over the prospector’s claim, ending with the prospector receiving a blow to the head and the fugitive falling off a cliff to his death. The Tramp eventually fin...Read Moreds himself in a gold rush town where he ultimately decides to give up prospecting.

After taking a job looking after another prospector’s cabin, he falls in love with a lonely saloon girl (Georgia Hale) whom he mistakenly thinks has fallen in love with him. He soon finds himself waylaid by the prospector he met earlier, who has developed amnesia and needs the Tramp to help him find his claim by leading him back to the first cabin.

One sequence was altered in the 1942 re-release so that instead of the Tramp finding a note from Georgia which he mistakenly believes is for him, he actually receives the note from her. Another major alteration is the ending, in which the now-wealthy Tramp originally gave Georgia a lingering kiss on board ship; the sound version ends before this scene. Now, the two share a romantic moment by the old house....Hide
shows.trivia: The fifth highest grossing silent film in history.

Owais Husain (Suniel Shetty), the owner of a controversial news station in Istanbul, offers Vikas a job that comes along with a huge salary and perks. Vikas is recently divorced from his wife Anjali (Shriya Saran) and jumps at the change of scene. After a while, Vikas decides to leave the job only to find out from Turkish Commando Rizwan Khan (Vivek Oberoi) that no one quits the news statio...Read Moren and lives to tell the tale. Is Vikas stuck in the job for life?...Hide
shows.trivia: Vivek Oberoi grew his hair for his role as a Turkish commando in the film and even worked out to flex some muscles and he is also working on his 6 pack-abs for the film.

shows.actor: Jackie Shroff, Salman Khan, Rambha, Ashwini Bhave, Shakti Kapoor
shows.musicDirector: Anand Raj Anand, Himesh Reshammiya, Surendra Singh Sodhi
shows.showDescription: Thakur Suraj Pratap (Jackie Shroff) marries Pooja (Ashwini Bhave), a girl from a poor family. Pooja lived with her father, mother and a brother named Raju (Salman Khan). Pooja and Raju are like one soul, so at the time of going to Suraj Pratap’s place Pooja and Raju both are sad. So, Suraj agrees to take Raju along with them as a part of dowry. At Suraj’s place they are introduced to his sister Jyoti. Jyoti and Raju fall in love with each other. Raju grows up...Read More in the house and lives life on the insipid philosophy of Jeejaji’s word being God’s word. After several years of their marriage Pooja is unable to give birth to a child. Things go awry when Jackie succumbs to the charms of the touring prostitute and her brother. How will Raju bring Suraj’s attention towards his sister?...Hide

shows.awards: Won Filmfare Award in 1999 for Best Actor: Shahrukh Khan, Best Actress: Kajol, Best Director: Karan Johar,Best Film: Yash Johar
shows.showDescription: Rahul (Shah Rukh Khan) lives with his eight-year-old daughter Anjali and his mother (Farida Jalal). His wife, Tina (Rani Mukerji) had died giving birth to Anjali. Tina knew that she was going to die during childbirth and has left a set of letters for her child. On her eighth birthday, Anjali gets to know about her parents’ lives before their marriage and also about the other Anjali (Kajol) in her father’s life. Now it is up to her to bring Rahul and Anjali to...Read Moregether. But will a small child be able to achieve this near impossible task?...Hide
shows.trivia: Karan Johar wanted Rani Mukherjee to be dubbed due to her husky voice, not knowing that her voice would become her trademark.

shows.showDescription: Arjun Ranawat (Salman Khan) is a noble Mumbai police officer. He is desperate to uphold the law in the city. He is assisted with his friend Inspector Haider Ali (Arbaaz Khan) in this task. He is the biggest impediment for Kashinath Trivedi who wants to rule the city. When he finds that Arjun and Haider cannot be stopped through higher authority’s pressure, he gets Haider killed in a fake encounter charging him as a Pakistani spy. Then he turns to his next target Ar...Read Morejun. They kidnap his sister Rakhi Dixit and while rescuing her he kills 18 people. Arjun gets imprisoned. Will anyone be able to save Arjun or will Kashinath succeed in his filthy plans?...Hide
shows.trivia: Sunny Deol was initially approached for the role of Inspector Arjun Ranavat.

shows.showDescription: Zootopia (2016) is an English animated movie, featuring the voices of Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman and Idris Elba, directed by Byron Howard and Rich Moore. In a city where herbivores and carnivores co-exist without the latter devouring the former because of law and order, Judy Hopps becomes the first rabbit to join the police force. While everyone is underestimating her skills, Judy is determined to solve a tough and dangerous case.

shows.showDescription: Thulsa Doom (James Earl Jones) is the evil king of the Snake Cult. He and his warriors kill the parents of a young Conan, while the boy is made a slave. Conan (Arnold Schwarzenegger) grows up to become a mighty warrior and fighter. When he is set free, Conan sets out to avenge his parents. He is joined by archer Subotai (Gerry Lopez) and the beautiful thief Valeria (Sandahl Bergman) who falls in love with him. They set out to rescue Princess Yasmina, the daughter of King...Read More Osric (Max von Sydow), from the Snake Cult and take revenge on Thulsa Doom....Hide
shows.trivia: Arnold Schwarzenegger had to tone down his workout, as his arm/chest muscles were so big that he couldn’t wield a sword properly.

shows.showDescription: A Canadian writer visits the Indian storyteller Pi Patel and asks him to tell his life story. Pi tells the story of his childhood in Pondicherry, India, and the origin of his nickname. One day, his father, a zoo owner, explains that the municipality is no longer supporting the zoo and he has hence decided to move to Canada, where the animals the family owns would also be sold. They board on a Japanese cargo ship with the animals and out of the blue, there is a storm. Aft...Read Moreer the tragic sinking of a ship, a solitary lifeboat remains bobbing on the Pacific ocean, with Pi Patel, a hyena, a zebra, a female orangutan and a Bengal tiger, the only survivors of the wreck. It’s a tale of faith, hope and fighting for survival....Hide
shows.trivia: Suraj Sharma, was never in the boat with a live tiger. Most of the tiger shots were very high-tech CGI. Only a few scenes, like the tiger swimming in the water, included a real tiger.

To avoid a check at customs, they hide the chip in a toy car that is run by remote control. There is a baggage mix up at the airport and the grumpy Mrs. Hess (Marian Seldes) lands up w...Read Moreith the car. She passes on the toy to young Alex who is her neighbour. Watch the hilarious turn of events when the four spies turn up in the neighbourhood to get their hands on the toy car....Hide

shows.showDescription: Exodus: Gods and Kings is an epic retelling of the Biblical story of Moses freeing the Jewish slaves from the evil Egyptian pharaohs. A High Priestess of Sekhmet (the war goddess) divines a prophecy from animal intestines, which she relates to Ramesses’ father, Seti I. There’s lots of gruesome violence, particularly in the depiction of the seven plagues, with shocking amounts of blood, death, destruction, chaos, and terror.  Shortly afterwards, Moses meets Nu...Read Moren, who informs him of his true lineage; he is the child of Hebrew parents who was sent by his sister Miriam to be raised by Pharaoh’s daughter. The Pharaoh King wants to pick the new ruler of Egypt due to his bad health. Ramses became king and finds out his brother was born a Jew. Moses tries to find himself and tries helping his true people. Two brothers now compete for Egypt, one brother born to rule, and another brother born to oppose the rules and lead his people to glory....Hide
shows.trivia: In an interview for Access Hollywood, Director, Ridley Scott claimed there was a final cut of the film that was 4 hours.

shows.showDescription: The film is set in the far future on earth. Johnny (Casper Van Dien) joins the army only because his girlfriend Carmen (Denise Richards) does. When he is all set to quit after a while, an asteroid from the orbit of Planet Klendathu hits his home town and kills all his family. Johnny and the other troopers set out to destroy the planet’s inhabitants and shocked to find Klendathu full of huge, deadly space bugs. Watch their fight for survival.

He and his best friend Layla (Danielle Panabaker) are sent to a secret school, Sky High – a school set in the clouds and is nothing like those on the earth. This is a high school for kids with super-powers. Wh...Read Moreile Will discovers his true strengths, he also finds out the important qualities that mark a true superhero....Hide

shows.showDescription: The Jungle Book is an all-new live-action epic adventure about Mowgli, a man-cub who has been raised by a family of wolves. But Mowgli finds he is no longer welcome in the jungle when fearsome tiger Shere Khan, who bears the scars of Man, promises to eliminate what he sees as a threat. Urged to abandon the only home he has ever known, Mowgli embarks on a captivating journey of self-discovery, guided by panther-turned-stern mentor Bagheera, and the free-spirited bear Balo...Read Moreo. Along the way, Mowgli encounters jungle creatures who don’t exactly have his best interests at heart, including Kaa, a python whose seductive voice and gaze hypnotizes the man-cub, and the smooth-talking King Louie, who tries to coerce Mowgli into giving up the secret to the elusive and deadly red flower fire....Hide

shows.showDescription: Grandpa Gohan (Randall Duk Kim) makes a dying request to his adopted grandson Goku (Justin Chatwin). Goku is to collect all seven magical orbs known as Dragon balls and save the world. Goku sets out with one such Dragon ball and goes in search of the other six with Master Roshi’s (Yun-fat Chow) help. He has to find them all before Lord Piccolo (James Marsters) gets his hands on them and becomes the most powerful man in the whole world.
shows.trivia: The film was mostly shot in an abandoned jeans factory in Durango, Mexico with blue and green screens.

shows.actor: Matthew  Broderick, Jean Reno, Maria Pitillo, Hank Azaria, Kevin Dunn
shows.showDescription: Niko (Matthew Broderick) is a Ukraine biologist. A military team headed by Colonel Hicks (Kevin Dunn) take Niko to check out giant claw marks on a beached freighter. The blood and giant-sized paw marks indicate some kind of huge reptile. They are joined by a few other experts in various fields on their hunt for Godzilla. Watch the film to see what happens when they come across Godzilla’s eggs about to hatch in the middle of the city.
shows.trivia: Tomoyuki Tanaka had produced all of the Japanese Godzilla movies. He died only a month before this film began actual production. This film is dedicated to him.

shows.showDescription: In the third installment in the Free Willy series, Jesse (Jason James Richter), the once-troubled youth whose life was changed by his friendship with the killer whale Willy, is spending the summer on board a ship assisting a group a whale researchers, including his old friend Randolph (August Schellenberg), and Drew (Annie Corley), an oceanographer. Jesse once used a harmonica to communicate with Willy, and when he plays his mouth harp through the ship’s underwater...Read More sound system, he is able to find his old friend, who is now raising a family of his own. As Jesse, Randolph, and Drew are out to study and assist the whales, a ten-year-old boy named Max (Vincent Berry) is accompanying his father John Wesley (Patrick Kilpatrick) on the fishing boat that John helps to run. Max soon discovers that John and the crew are not fishing for salmon, as he believed, but killer whales, which is illegal, but very profitable, as whale meat fetches $200 a pound on the black market. Jesse meets Max on shore, and when Jesse learns what John and his crew are up to, he tries to teach Max that while his father may not be a bad man, he’s doing a very bad thing in killing the whales, who are intelligent, compassionate, and deserve the right to live; Jesse also acts to save Willy and his family from John and his fellow poachers.
